name: Toadal Domination
description:
A small Top Down Shooter with some Tower Defense elements I made for the GMTK 2022 game jam.

controls:

  • move - WASD
  • shoot & drag dice - LEFT MOUSE

P.S:

I didn't have much time to play test the game and stuff, so sorry if you encounter any bugs.  and for some reason when I uploaded the game to Itch, The Player's gun didn't appear in game, hence the weird frog creating bullets from thin air thing.
